name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: X (Twitter) Post Text Editor - Bold, Italic, Underline

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables bold, italic, and underlined text in Twitter posts!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝗕𝗼𝗹𝗱, 𝐼𝑡𝑎𝑙𝑖𝑐, and U̲n̲d̲e̲r̲l̲i̲n̲e̲d̲ Fonts for Twitter (X).

Please Note: 
- Only works on Latin characters!

The Font Editor is free and open source: https://github.com/maxontech/twitter-font-editor

X Font Editor is developed and maintained by Max: https://maxontech.io/
